issue.title: [JS] Add ability to run tests in headless browsers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5740](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5740). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that we have a compatibility check that modifies behavior based on the features in a supported browser, we should really be running our tests in various browsers to exercise the various cases.

For example right now we don't actually run tests on the non-BigNum code.
